page.title: 16Occupations in 1985
page.content: In{Woodsetts}in{1985}most men work in offices and most women are house wives.There are also a few brick layers,surgeons,some teachers.There are several farmers and some people who work with computers.We also have a dress maker several typists and some ladies work in an old peoples home.In Woodsetts there is a community police man who is based at{Firbeck}and cycles to{Woodsetts.}There are some TV engineers.Most people work out of our block and traval by car to{Dinnington {Maltby,Rotherham,Doncaster,Sheffield, {and Worksop}and live in the block. There are not very many people {unemployed}in{Woodsetts}or{Thorpe {Salvin}but there are over three million unemployed in the whole country.
